summary: "Airplane!" is a funny movie from 1980 that makes fun of disaster movies. It's about a plane in trouble and the crazy things that happen on board. The movie stars Robert Hays and Julie Hagerty, and it's full of silly jokes and humor. It was a big hit and is still loved today. Many people think it's one of the funniest movies ever made, and it's even been saved in the United States National Film Registry because it's so important and funny.
title: Airplane!
